    • Method Detail

      • select

        boolean select(FileContext candidate)
        Determine if this rule applies to a given filesystem entity
        Parameters:
        candidate - The FileContext to check to see if the rule applies to.
        Returns:
        True if the rule applies, false otherwise.

        List<Mapping> getMappings(FileContext candidate)
        Get the mapping to a package description Artifact for the given File selected by this rule.
        Parameters:
        candidate - The FileContext to get the mapping for.
        Returns:
        A list of the mappings from the FileContext to possible artifacts.
